sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to union.
message_1: Let A = {3, 4} and B = {5, 6}. Calculate (A x B) $\cup$ {7} and ({A x B} $\cup$ {7}) using set builder notation. Show that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to union.
